DOC.criteria: history positive diagnostic test ragweed within past 2 year ; positive bilateral response ragweed induce conjunctival allergen challenge ocular infection ; history retinal detachment , diabetic neuropathy , progressive retinal disease ; moderate severe asthma ; dry eye syndrome ; history severe , unstable , uncontrolled cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal autoimmune disease ; pregnancy lactation
